website_summaries.verdict: The Merrell All Out Crush Tough Mudder 2 was specifically designed for the Tough Mudder Competition. Users who used it for that purpose said that the shoe performed well, and took on the demands of the trail. Water was even draining well from the shoe. However, one major drawback some reviewers found was that pebbles and debris easily got into the shoe which caused some discomfort.
pros: Most reviewers commended the grip the outsole provided
They expressed that they did not experience slipping and sliding as much as other Tough Mudder competitors
Another runner said that the grip was also sufficient on uneven terrain
One user said that the laces did not unravel throughout the competition
A good number of testers observed that the shoe was draining well
The weight was light but the midsole still had enough cushioning for long runs on moderate terrain, said one runner
cons: Debris easily got into the shoe through the ankle area, based on a good number of reviews
This caused one runner to feel pain while running downhill
One runner said that the collar rubbed on his ankles causing tender spots

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoes and very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I usually go for waterproof Merrells, but I needed a light trainer for the summer.They are comfy,dry quickly and black and orange design looks gorgeous.I absolutly love these trainers.Perfect for walking,running.I tested them on long walks over 10km and they are very supportive,no blisters.Also very light as well.Supper shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Dorota Rerutkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: No grip. Slip sliding away.
customer_reviews.text: Trail running? I think not. I havent fallen over for 20 years, until today, I put on my 'trail' running shoes and went for a run along a trail, the first slight incline on damp rock and my feet just slid from under me! Knackered my arm, scratched my fit bit and wounded my pride! Perfect for a flat park run on a dry day on grass. Potential death trap on an actual trail! This product is probably responsible for all injuries during a tough mudder. Stick to asics in future.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very light and flexible... The one thing ...
customer_reviews.text: Very light and flexible ...The one thing I would change is the insole, there isn't one and the bottom is a ruff mesh.... have tried putting a insole but that makes the trainer too tight on the toes
customer_reviews.author: Mutts Mammy

customer_reviews.title: Great for tough mudder
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 pairs of these for my daughters to take part in tough mudder. They both loved them saying that they were comfortable even when wet and had so much grip that they managed to stay upright even when most people were sliding around
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handsome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant price for a top notch trail shoe - the TM branding is great too. Light and strong with good traction and support.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trail shoes
customer_reviews.text: Got these for Total Warrior and they were great, exactly what I needed....and didn’t ruin my feet even after 12k on their 1st outing
customer_reviews.author: MRS JC GILL

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight trail shoe
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and comfortable. I’m usually a 5 in shoes but got a 6!in these and they’re great. No rubbing and coped with a muddy trail 10k with no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brillaint
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, I used these for tough mudder 2019. Cant fault xx
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Tough Mudder!
customer_reviews.text: Used for Tough Mudder event. They were really comfy and provided a good grip in the mud and on obstacles.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs E

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great trail trainers, very comfortable, had no problems at all
customer_reviews.author: Kelly b

product_meta.title: Merrell Women's All Out Crush Tough Mudder 2 Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Fast and versatile shoe grips, drains, and protects during the toughest of tough Mudder challenges. Features: mesh and tpu upper traditional lace closure Lycra neoprene heel lining for comfort Integrated foot bed trail protect pad offers additional support off road M Select grip outsole tunes each outsole with durable traction that grips when and where you need it Stack height (heel/toe): 22.5/16.5 mm; foot bed: 0 mm; insole: 2 mm; midsole: 14/8 mm; sole: 1.5 mm web, 5/6.5 mm lug Vegan friendly.
feature_bullets: TPU Overlays - Offer durability and help provide a snug fit.
Lycra Neoprene Heel Lining - Offers extreme comfort.
Trail Protect - Offers additional support off road.
EVA Midsole - Absorbs shock and impact forces.
